title: LLMPrompt
description: Firestore document stored at llm_prompts/{promptId}. MVP: stores only instruction texts (systemInstruction + userPrompt).

schemaVersion.description: Schema version for this prompt document format.

systemInstruction.description: System instruction text (no templating in MVP).

userPrompt.description: User prompt text (no templating in MVP). Worker appends a generated **UserInput** section.
